resources.string: Pizzeria Cafe Mozart has existed since 2003 and from the very beginning is known for its irresistible taste and wide choice of dishes , a relaxed atmosphere and high-quality entertainment. Located on the central square , it\'s a favorite place to go , and is the unavoidable destination to travelers , as well as tourists visiting the Foca and surrounding jewels of nature.The spacious and comfortable interior , with 90 chairs and magnificent garden of 100 seats , which comes out on the market , with Italian specialties and homemade cook room and carefully selected music , and often live music , the place for falling in love , making friends and business arrangements , and ordinary break with a coffee or a drink .The best proof of the quality of our services is the " Golden Crown " , which was Caffe pizzeria Mozart awarded by the Association of Hoteliers and Restaurateurs BiH .The chef of our kitchen prepare 120 dishes. In addition to the well-known pizza ,which we are making in 15 different ways , we offer a generous and varied breakfast , sandwiches , pastas , risotto , a wide range of dishes from various types of meat ( chicken , turkey , pork, veal , beef ) , fish and seafood specialties and an extensive wine map , fruit pastries , as well as a large selection of daily fresh pastries and cakes .We offer home delivery , packing food " to take " , and we organize catering for all kinds of celebrations . We make cakes to taste, a variety of shapes and flavors .Visit us and see that , with the homely service and friendly staff , the prices are reasonable also.We guarantee you a unique experience - your Cafe Mozart pizzeria .
Visiting hours : Every day from 7:00 am to 24:00 pm
